testCase.name: characters-api getCharacters should return the list of characters with default sorting (name, asc)
characters-api getCharacters should sort by name in ascending order
characters-api getCharacters should sort by name in descending order
characters-api getCharacters should sort by modified date in ascending order
characters-api getCharacters should sort by modified date in descending order
characters-api getCharacters should handle invalid sort parameter (defaults to name)
characters-api getCharacters should handle invalid order parameter (defaults to asc)
characters-api getCharacters should handle empty options object
characters-api getCharacters should handle elements without names when sorting by modified
characters-api getCharacterById find by numeric id
characters-api getCharacterById find by id as string
characters-api getCharacterById find string entry
characters-api getCharacterById find by name when id missing
characters-api getCharacterById throws Response with 404 status when not found
edge cases - characters not an array getCharacters returns empty array when characters module is not an array
edge cases - characters not an array getCharacterById returns null when characters module is not an array

CharacterDetail component back to characters link works correctly
